headline: Ameriprise Leadership Shift After Record Results Might Change The Case For Investing In Ameriprise Financial (AMP)
summary: Ameriprise Financial, Inc. announced that Joseph E. Sweeney, President of Advice & Wealth Management Products & Service Delivery, decided to retire from the company on April 3, 2026, marking a leadership transition in a core business line. This change comes shortly after Ameriprise reported record Q4 2025 earnings and client assets of about US$1.70 billions, underscoring the importance of continuity in its advice and wealth management franchise. Next, we’ll examine how Sweeney’s planned...
